ISSUE.TITLE: bug: link error after splite architecture design documents
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description After separating the architecture design document, other documents are not modified, resulting in link errors. ### Minimal test code / Steps to reproduce the issue 1. Open `https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/admin-api` 2. Find `Router` Link or 1. Open `https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/master/docs/zh/latest/admin-api.md` 2. Find `Router` Link ### What's the actual result? (including assertion message & call stack if applicable) Redirect to a page that does not exist. (Page Not Found) ### What's the expected result? Show correct document content.
